Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Level Description: Advanced (complete and accurate representation of all elements)
CAN: Illustrate a detailed and accurate device that allows people to communicate over a distance using sound, showing a string telephone connecting two students.
Include clear depictions of the string telephone demonstrating how it sends sound over a distance, with visible cups and string.
Incorporate illustrations of elements indicating the use of sound, such as vibrations or sound waves, traveling through the string.
Demonstrate, through the drawing, that the device can both send and receive sound information effectively.
Use simple materials in the drawing, such as cups and string, and show understanding of their function in the device.
Explain accurately how the string telephone works and why it helps people communicate over distances, using details within the drawing.
CANNOT: May inconsistently label certain parts of the device, but this does not affect overall comprehension of the concept.
Might show minor aesthetic variances like slightly different cup sizes or imperfectly straight strings, but these do not impact function or understanding.
